name: PushReturnOrder
description:
Creates a returnorder with all specified data

It is required to send the identifier for the ReturnOrder of the external system by providing a BackendSystemID and a BackendID.

A return is based of an OriginalOrder. This order can be identifier by the OriginalBackendID or the OriginalOrderID. One of those is required.

If the stock is already received, set the `AlreadyReceived` to true. This will ship the order immediately.

If the stock is already received and the open amount should be refunded directly, set `AutoRefund` to true.

The Lines have to be identified by the original line, this should be done by providing the OriginalBackendID or the OriginalOrderLineID.
If those are not available the CustomID of the product can be set, but matching based on that is not advised.
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api` with functionality `PushReturnOrder:None`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-BackendSystemID
headers.description: The ID of the backend system that is used to resolve the IDs.

request_samples.name: JSON
request_samples.sample:
{
  "AlreadyReceived": true,
  "AutoRefund": true,
  "BackendID": "string",
  "BackendSystemID": "string",
  "CustomFields": {
    "key": "any valid json value"
  },
  "IsCustomerReturn": true,
  "IsOffer": true,
  "Lines": [
    {
      "CustomID": "string",
      "OriginalBackendID": "string",
      "OriginalOrderLineID": 123,
      "ProductID": 123,
      "Quantity": 123,
      "Remark": "string",
      "ReturnReasonID": 123,
      "SerialNumber": "string"
    }
  ],
  "OfferExpirationDate": "2024-11-27",
  "OriginalBackendID": "string",
  "OriginalOrderID": 123,
  "Remark": "string",
  "ReturnCosts": {
    "Description": "string",
    "TaxAmount": 123.456,
    "TaxRate": 123.456,
    "UnitPrice": 123.456
  },
  "ReturnToOrganizationUnitBackendID": "string",
  "SendInvoice": true,
  "StockOrganizationUnitID": 123
}

request_samples.name: CURL
request_samples.sample:
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "EVA-User-Agent: MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  --data '{
  "AlreadyReceived": true,
  "AutoRefund": true,
  "BackendID": "string",
  "BackendSystemID": "string",
  "CustomFields": {
    "key": "any valid json value"
  },
  "IsCustomerReturn": true,
  "IsOffer": true,
  "Lines": [
    {
      "CustomID": "string",
      "OriginalBackendID": "string",
      "OriginalOrderLineID": 123,
      "ProductID": 123,
      "Quantity": 123,
      "Remark": "string",
      "ReturnReasonID": 123,
      "SerialNumber": "string"
    }
  ],
  "OfferExpirationDate": "2024-11-27",
  "OriginalBackendID": "string",
  "OriginalOrderID": 123,
  "Remark": "string",
  "ReturnCosts": {
    "Description": "string",
    "TaxAmount": 123.456,
    "TaxRate": 123.456,
    "UnitPrice": 123.456
  },
  "ReturnToOrganizationUnitBackendID": "string",
  "SendInvoice": true,
  "StockOrganizationUnitID": 123
}' \
  https://euw.acme.test.eva-online.cloud/message/PushReturnOrder

C.name: CustomID
C.description: Article number of the product from the 3rd party

C.name: OriginalBackendID
C.description:
ID of the original orderline from the 3rd party

This is the ID of a `OrderLine`

C.name: OriginalOrderLineID
C.description: This is the ID of a `OrderLine`

C.name: ProductID
C.description: This is the ID of a `Product`

C.name: Quantity
C.description: Quantity that has been returned, positive

C.name: ReturnReasonID
C.description: This is the ID of a `ReturnReason`

B.name: AutoRefund
B.description: Try to refund the order immediately

B.name: BackendID
B.description: A unique identifier for the order, within the context of given `BackendSystemID`

B.name: BackendSystemID
B.description: A code, free of choice for the calling 3rd party application creating the order

B.name: IsCustomerReturn
B.description: If this order pending a customer return

B.name: IsOffer
B.description: Specifies if the order is an offer - this is only happening if AutoRefund or AlreadyReceived are set to false. If no value is specified, the default is false.

B.name: OriginalBackendID
B.description:
The unique identifier of the original order, within the context of given `BackendSystemID`

This is the ID of a `Order`

B.name: OriginalOrderID
B.description: This is the ID of a `Order`

B.name: ReturnToOrganizationUnitBackendID
B.description:
Where the return will be booked. If not set, the logged in OU will be used.

This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnit`

B.name: SendInvoice
B.description: Sends an invoice (credit note) - this is only done if AutoRefund or AlreadyReceived are also true, and requires a customer to be set

B.name: StockOrganizationUnitID
B.description: This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnit`

F.name: Code
F.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

F.name: Message
F.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

F.name: RequestID
F.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

F.name: Type
F.description: A short description of the error type.

G.name: ExternalIDs
G.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

G.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
G.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

G.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
G.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.

E.name: AlreadyExists
E.description: If the order with the specified BackendID already existed

E.name: ID
E.description: This is the ID of a `Order`
